resources.string: This coju.mobi file browser has all the capabilities you ever wanted in an Android file browser. Itâ€™s easy to use interface makes a distinction between files and folders with different background colors with files/folders without read access are in a red background.\n The app allows you to select multiple files/folders and delete them with a single tap. Selected files and folder can also be shared with friend by sending them by email, or putting it in Google cloud. You also have the option of putting multiple files and folders in a single ZIP file and sending them via email.
